SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} AND STATE = 0 AND depth > 0

SELECT B.RN, B.RNO, B.RCONTENT, B.BNO, B.STATE, B.DEPTH, B.GROUP_NO, B.GROUP_ORD, B.MNO, B.NAME FROM(SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM + 1 AS RN, A.RNO, A.RCONTENT, A.BNO, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORD, A.MNO, A.NAME FROM (SELECT R.RNO, R.RCONTENT, R.BNO, R.STATE, R.DEPTH, R.GROUP_NO, R.GROUP_ORD, M.MNO, M.NAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN REPLY R ON M.MNO = R.MNO WHERE STATE = 0 AND DEPTH = 0 AND BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC) A, (SELECT @ROWNUM:= 0) C) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} and #{endRecord}

SELECT B.RNO, B.RCONTENT, B.BNO, B.STATE, B.DEPTH, B.GROUP_NO, B.GROUP_ORD, B.MNO, B.NAME FROM(SELECT A.RNO, A.RCONTENT, A.BNO, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO, A.GROUP_ORD, A.MNO, A.NAME FROM (SELECT R.RNO, R.RCONTENT, R.BNO, R.STATE, R.DEPTH, R.GROUP_NO, R.GROUP_ORD, M.MNO, M.NAME FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN REPLY R ON M.MNO = R.MNO WHERE STATE = 0 AND DEPTH > 0 AND GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, GROUP_ORD ASC) A) B
